content: first heel marker sm k27 31 sm knit to first instep marker work instep sts in pattern toe as established round 1 decrease round k1 ssk knit across to last 3 stitches before first instep marker k2tog k1 slip continue working rounds 2-3 until there are 100 marker k1 ssk knit across to last 3 stitches before 110 sts ending on round 3 37 43 instep second instep marker k2tog k1 sts/63=18/27/18/ 67=18/31/18 heel sts round 2 k work rounds 1-2 until 30 34 sts remain work decrease round only until 22 sts remain use note heel measured approximately 2 1/4 inches on kitchener
